forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 23C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clouds and some sun this morning with more clouds for this afternoon. High 71F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a shower late. Low 13C. ESE winds at 5 to 10 km/h, increasing to 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Slight chance of a shower late. Low near 55F. ESE winds at less than 5 mph, increasing to 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain showers in the morning becoming steadier in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 16C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. Windy. Thunder possible. High near 60F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers likely. Low 9C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thunderstorms. Low 49F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 20C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 67F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. High 18C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 63F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High around 65F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early giving way to clouds and a few showers after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
